ValidationRule.description: Requires that Events/Tasks have a contact, account, lead, or opportunity associated with it.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), ISBLANK(WhatId), ISBLANK(WhoId), ! CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must associate Events with an object using the Related To or Name fields.
